Clitoral blood flow access utilizing 12 megahertz linear probe . With light pressure , probe apply sagittally proximal clitoral hood angle le 20 degree . Peak clitoral artery systolic end diastolic velocity measure resistive index value record . Then utilize 7.5 megahertz vaginal probe baseline uterine artery flow measurement also obtain record . The patient place exam room nurse practitioner apply GRAS cream placebo patient ' clitoral hood minimal manipulation . Ten minute later sonographer repeat two scan record measurement . The patient come back another day repeat process . Patients cod assure ever cream receive first visit get opposite second time .
